<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

For a given pointer <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a>, this retains a list of Arguments of functions in the same SCC that the pointer data flows into. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

For a given pointer <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a>, this retains a list of Arguments of functions in the same SCC that the pointer data flows into.

We use this to build an SCC of the arguments.

Definition at line 495 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/functionattrs-cpp">FunctionAttrs.cpp</a>.
